subject: Help with the games
description_text:
Hello, I'm recently bought the pedals plus x, already installed the
manager, so far so good, the game (lm ultimate in this case) recognises the
software but doesn't work, at the manager hub I can adjust the pedals but
"Game not found" and shows a small window to creat a path, but I don't know
what file should I put there.
Other question, I'm thinking of buying the vam 3 motors, so I need another
power controller or I can use the one that comes with the pedals?
.
Thank you for your help
Mario

conversations.body_text: Hi Mário Capitão,  Please open LMU (Le Mans Ultimate) directly from Steam and check if it can detect our pedals. Also, please note that the VAM motor requires our 24V power supply to function properly.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053500730
